publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1271 Mr Brian Monteith: Kids' Lit Quiz-That the Parliament congratulates Wayne Mills from New Zealand for his efforts in making the Kids' Lit Quiz a global literary challenge event for school students by expanding from New Zealand to the UK in 2003; further congratulates the students, and supporting staff, at Dunblane High School on their tremendous achievement in coming first and second in the Scottish heat and going on to win the UK final, and wishes the team all the best for the international final in New Zealand in June this year.
S2M-1271 Kids' Lit Quiz (lodged on 5 May 2004) Donald Gorrie*

S2M-1271 Mr Brian Monteith: Kids' Lit Quiz-That the Parliament congratulates Wayne Mills from New Zealand for his efforts in making the Kids' Lit Quiz a global literary challenge event for school students by expanding from New Zealand to the UK in 2003; further congratulates the students, and supporting staff, at Dunblane High School on their tremendous achievement in coming first and second in the Scottish heat and going on to win the UK final, and wishes the team all the best for the international final in New Zealand in June this year. Supported by: Donald Gorrie
S2M-1271 Kids' Lit Quiz (lodged on 5 May 2004) Ms Sandra White*
